description: CSS3 Animations with special effects.

name: Css-loaders
description: A collection of loading spinners animated with CSS.

name: SpinKit
description: A collection of loading indicators animated with CSS.

name: Bounce.js
description: Create beautiful CSS3 powered animations in no time.

name: EaselJS
description: EaselJS is a library for building high-performance interactive 2D content in HTML5.

name: Fabric.js
description: JavaScript canvas library with animation support.

name: Paper.js
description: The Swiss Army Knife of Vector Graphics Scripting – Scriptographer ported to JavaScript and the browser, using HTML5 Canvas.

name: Konva
description: Konva.js is an HTML5 Canvas JavaScript framework that extends the 2d context by enabling canvas interactivity for desktop and mobile applications.

name: Two.js
description: A renderer agnostic two-dimensional drawing api for the web with animation support.

name: Ocanvas
description: JavaScript library for object-based canvas drawing.

name: Curtainsjs
description: Lightweight vanilla WebGL JavaScript library that turns HTML DOM elements into interactive textured planes.

name: Hover-effect
description: JavaScript library to draw and animate images on hover.

name: Pts.js
description: Pts is a typescript/javascript library for visualization and creative-coding.

name: tsParticles
description: tsParticles is a lightweight typescript/javascript library for creating easily particles animations.

name: AOS
description: Animate on scroll library.

name: Laxxx
description: Simple & light weight (3kb minified & zipped) vanilla JavaScript plugin to create smooth & beautiful animations when you scrolllll!

name: Wow
description: Reveal CSS animation as you scroll down a page.

name: Scrollreveal
description: Animate elements as they scroll into view.

name: ScrollMagic
description: The JavaScript library for magical scroll interactions.

name: Motus
description: Animation library that mimics CSS keyframes when scrolling.

name: Sal
description: Performance focused, lightweight scroll animation library.

name: Malarkey

name: Typed.js
description: A JavaScript Typing Animation Library.

name: Shuffle-text
description: Shuffle-text is JavaScript text effect library such as cool legacy of Flash.

name: Typebot
description: JavaScript library for typing animation.

name: Blotter

name: Motion
description: Open source, production-ready animation and gesture library for React.

name: SVGR
description: Transform SVGs into React components.

name: React tsParticles
description: ReactJS wrapper for tsParticles

name: React spring
description: Open source, spring-physics based animation library for React that supports interpolations. Fast and easy to use.

name: Svgartista
description: SVG Artista is a tool that helps you animate stroke and fill properties in your SVG images with plain CSS code. It should work fine with path, line, polyline, rect, circle, ellipse and polygon elements. It cannot animate SVG gradients though, so please keep that in mind.

name: Mantra
description: Mantra is a timeline editing tool for web animations. It is inspired by tools such as Adobe Flash and After Effects.

name: Animista
description: Animista is a place where you can play with a collection of pre-made css animations, tweak them and get only those you will actually use.

name: Cssanimate
description: Welcome to CssAnimate.com, tool for easy and fast creating CSS3 keyframes animation, right in your browser without using any desktop software. If you want to render complex and consistent CSS3 animation on your site this tool is made for you! You can create complex CSS3 keyframe animation without any coding and to get ready made css styles for using on your site.

name: Ceaser
description: Now that we can use CSS transitions in all the modern browsers, let's make them pretty. I love the classic Penner equations with Flash and jQuery, so I included most of those. If you're anything like me*, you probably thought this about the default easing options: “ease-in, ease-out etc.” The mysterious cubic-bezier has a lot of potential, but was cumbersome to use. Until now. Also, touch-device friendly!

name: Cubic Bezier
description: A great utility for creating Bezier curves. You can import and export curves to/from your library to share them with others.

name: Keyframer
description: Tool that help visualize animation components and output the code required.

name: CSS Animation Kit
description: Select any predefined samples from top panel. Below samples there is a timeline of @keyframes. Timeline has 101 keyframes ( 0% to 100%) direction from left to right. Highlighted keyframe indicate that some style is assigned to that point. You can add new style at selected point.

name: Yuri Artyukh youtube channel
description: This man creates amazing web animations using various technologies for this, and recording it all in steam format.
